pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Collagen Booster 75g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A delicious beauty blend with vitamin C derived from
Acerola, Camu Camu, Baobab and other superfruits
to support collagen formation for glowing skin.

Wanderlust Collagen Booster is a consciously created plant-active beauty fruit blend. With vitamin C derived from Acerola, Camu Camu, Baobab and other superfruits to support collagen formation for beautiful glowing skin. Vitamin C is an essential nutrient to support collagen formation and healthy connective tissue important for skin health and provides antioxidant support to protect against free radical damage.

Size: 75 g NET

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS: Lacuma powder*, Baobab fruit pulp powder* (20%), Superfruit juice
powder blend (Raspberry juice, Strawberry juice, Pomegranate juice, Elderberry juice, Blackcurrant juice, Blueberry juice, Cranberry juice, Acai puree, Goji juice), Goji berry juice powder*, Maltodextrin derived from tapioca, Camu Camu powder* (2%), natural flavour (Raspberry), Acacia gum*, Brown rice hulls*, Acerola cherry powder* (1%), Guar gum*, Stevia extract*, Australian freeze dried Finger Lime powder, Beetroot extract.

*Organic ingredients

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, soy, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Directions

SERVING SUGGESTION: Add 5 g (2 1/2 teaspoons) of powder into water, juice, your favourite smoothie or breakfast bowl.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry
place away from direct heat
and sunlight. Do not use if
inner seal is missing or broken.
